ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_cnnrg | |- CCfld e. NrmRing |

| 3 | 2 | #P_simpli | |- RR e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) |
| 4 |  | #P_df-refld | |- RRfld = ( CCfld |`s RR ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_subrgnrg | |- ( ( CCfld e. NrmRing /\ RR e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) -> RRfld e. NrmRing ) |
| 6 | 1, 3, 5 | #P_mp2an | |- RRfld e. NrmRing |
| 7 | 2 | #P_simpri | |- RRfld e. DivRing |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_pm3.2i | |- ( RRfld e. NrmRing /\ RRfld e. DivRing ) |
| 9 |  | #P_rezh | |- ( ZMod ` RRfld ) e. NrmMod |
| 10 |  | #P_reofld | |- RRfld e. oField |

| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( chr ` RRfld ) = 0 |

| 14 |  | #P_recusp | |- RRfld e. CUnifSp |

| 17 |  | #P_rebase | |- RR = ( Base ` RRfld ) |
| 18 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ( dist ` RRfld ) |` ( RR X. RR ) ) = ( ( dist ` RRfld ) |` ( RR X. RR ) ) |
| 19 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ZMod ` RRfld ) = ( ZMod ` RRfld ) |
| 20 | 17, 18, 19 | #P_isrrext | |- ( RRfld e. RRExt <-> ( ( RRfld e. NrmRing /\ RRfld e. DivRing ) /\ ( ( ZMod ` RRfld ) e. NrmMod /\ ( chr ` RRfld ) = 0 ) /\ ( RRfld e. CUnifSp /\ ( UnifSt ` RRfld ) = ( metUnif ` ( ( dist ` RRfld ) |` ( RR X. RR ) ) ) ) ) ) |
| 21 | 8, 13, 16, 20 | #P_mpbir3an | |- RRfld e. RRExt |
